CustomField.description: TCV In Year Revenue INCREMENTAL ONLY (with products) (IYR).
CustomField.formula: IF (Contract_Start_Date__c = Contract_End_Date__c, IncrementalRevenue__c , IF(YED__c = YSD__c, (1/( (Contract_End_Date__c - Contract_Start_Date__c)+1))*IncrementalRevenue__c , IF(YED__c - YSD__c > 0, (YED__c - YSD__c + 1)/(Contract_End_Date__c - Contract_Start_Date__c + 1) *IncrementalRevenue__c , 0)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: TCV In Year Revenue INCREMENTAL ONLY (with products) (IYR).
CustomField.label: In Year Revenue Incremental Only
